    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10542001">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10542001">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10542001">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           United States Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10542001">
          <p>
           This is a list of selected multi-purpose resources.&nbsp; For additional recommendations by topic, see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Finding Statistics and Data: Topical Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10542001" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12808343">
              <a id="link_12808343" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808343,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808343}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808350">
              <a id="link_12808350" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/agencies/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808350,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808350}); ">
               Agencies Providing Federal Statistical Information (FedStats)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to official statistical information produced by the U.S. federal government.  Browse by agency to connect to agencies' websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808388">
              <a id="link_12808388" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://hsus.cambridge.org/HSUSWeb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808388,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808388}); ">
               Historical Statistics of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics from colonial times to modern day covering population, work and welfare, economic structure and performance, economic sectors, and governance and international relations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808345">
              <a id="link_12808345" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808345,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808345}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808489">
              <a id="link_12808489" href="http://lehighvalleyresearch.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808489,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808489}); ">
               Lehigh Valley Research Consortium
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Quantitative and qualitative data on the Lehigh Valley on: demographics, public opinion, economic indicators, non-profit sector, governmental sector, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808479">
              <a id="link_12808479" href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808479,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808479}); ">
               Pennsylvania State Data Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808351">
              <a id="link_12808351" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808351,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808395">
              <a id="link_12808395" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808395,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808395}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and comprehensive summary of statistics on the social, political, and economic organization of the United States.  Current and archived editions (1995- ) are available online, as well.   Old print editions (1886- ) are in the Trexler Library Government Documents section starting at C 3.134:886.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10542004">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10542004">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10542004">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           International Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10542004">
          <p>
           This is a list of selected multi-purpose resources.&nbsp; For additional recommendations by topic, see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Finding Statistics and Data: Topical Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10542004" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12808525">
              <b>
               International Historical Statistics, 1750-2000
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 310 M681i v.1-3 (Level B)
               <br />
               Key economic and social indicators for 1750-2000.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808438">
              <a id="link_12808438" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808438,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information, including statistics, on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for hundreds of world entities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808405">
              <a id="link_12808405" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808405,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808405}); ">
               Europa World Year Book
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief statistics by country on a variety of topics, including: area and population, health and welfare, agriculture, industry, trade, transport, education, and more.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22640075">
              <a id="link_22640075" href="http://hdr.undp.org/en" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22640075,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22640075}); ">
               Human Development Reports (United Nations Development Programme)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808362">
              <a id="link_12808362" href="http://www.census.gov/aboutus/stat_int.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808362,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808362}); ">
               International Statistical Agencies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to international statistical agencies.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808360">
              <a id="link_12808360" href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808360,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808360}); ">
               OFFSTATS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to free official, international statistics resources by country, region, and subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808359">
              <a id="link_12808359" href="http://data.un.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808359,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808359}); ">
               U.N. Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search across the United Nation's statistical databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808443">
              <a id="link_12808443" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/syb/default.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808443,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808443}); ">
               United Nations Statistical Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Annual compilation of a wide range of international economic, social and environmental statistics on over 200 countries and areas, compiled from sources including UN agencies and other international, national and specialized organizations."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12808358">
              <a id="link_12808358" href="http://data.worldbank.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12808358,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808358}); ">
               World Bank Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics for countries around the world on a wide variety of topics, including education-related topics.  From the World Bank.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10544024">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544024">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544024">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Public Opinion Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10544024">
          <div id="boxatt10544024" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12810472">
              <a id="link_12810472" href="http://www.electionstudies.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810472,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12810472}); ">
               American National Election Studies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Produces high quality data on voting, public opinion, and political participation."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810477">
              <a id="link_12810477" href="http://www.gallup.com/home.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810477,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12810477}); ">
               Gallup
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Presents daily briefings on a single current topic, as well as recent Gallup Poll findings.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810482">
              <a id="link_12810482" href="http://www.pollingreport.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12810482}); ">
               Polling Report
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Biweekly overview of recent poll trends.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12810544">
              <a id="link_12810544" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/direct.asp?db=ufh&amp;jid=POQ&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12810544,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12810544}); ">
               Public Opinion Quarterly -- "The Polls"
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Regular feature of preeminent scholarly journal on public opinion and polling, discusses recent surveys.  Browse through each issue to access "The Polls" or search across the journal by topic to check for features on your topic.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2978383" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
